title.narrative: Capacity of constituens strengthened to prevent unacceptable forms of work among women and indigenous workers in target sectors

description.narrative: The project's objectives are: Improved policies and actions for preventing unacceptable forms of work and improving working conditions for indigenous peoples. Milestones: 1, 2, 3 and 4. (Time frame: Mid-2019); and Capacity building: Enhanced capacities of constituents and indigenous peoples’ organizations on legal and policy processes of relevance to indigenous peoples in the world of work. These include the draft Indigenous Peoples’ Rights Bill, national labour legislation, collective agreement and relevant ILO instruments, as well as the ILO standards-setting on violence and harassment. Milestones: 1 to 7 (Time frame: December 2019).

participating-org.narrative: Sweden, Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 7.1. Increased capacity of the member States to ensure respect for, promote and realize fundamental principles and rights at work

transaction.ref: BGD/18/50/SWE-2019-BGD229 - Capacity of the government, employers' and workers' organizations strengthened to prevent unacceptable forms of work including for indigenous peoples and child labourers

provider-org.narrative: Sweden, Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency
